skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.DamageProduction
skill.description: For an agent to enact the action of damaging the resource node capabiltiy of production. Once this action is complete, the resource node production will be definitely decreased with the specified quantity of resource.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to act on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource that will be removed from the node capability of production.

feedback.name: damageProductionActionCompleted
feedback.description: Sent once simulation action is complete (production capability of the node is definitely decreased with the specified quantity).
